dt: {bc}a person (such as a monarch) ruling with unlimited authority
{bc}one who has undisputed influence or power

dt.t: He was the {wi}autocrat{/wi} of his household.

et: French {it}autocrate{/it}, from Greek {it}autokratēs{/it} ruling by oneself, absolute, from {it}aut-{/it} + {it}-kratēs{/it} ruling {ma}{mat|-crat|}{/ma}
shortdef: a person (such as a monarch) ruling with unlimited authority
one who has undisputed influence or power
